menu:
• Ramen € 13,50 €
    Each ramen has Tokumaru handmade noodles, slowly boiled broth, vegetables and nori seaweed. Meat portions come with marinated egg
  • Shoyu Ramen
    Chashu pork and soy sauce broth
  • Vegan Tantan Ramen
    Fried tofu, shiitake mushrooms and tantan broth
  • Don € 13,50 €
    Bowl of sushi rice, teriyaki sauce, salad, sesame dressing, edamame beans, wakame and marinated cauliflower
  • Salmon Avocado Don
    Salmon, avocado, yuzu wasabi sauce and Japanese mayonnaise
  • Spicy Vegan Tofu Avocado Don
    Fried tofu, avocado and chili mayonnaise
